titleStmt.title: The humble petition of the Lord Major, aldermen, and commons of the city of London, in Common-Councell assembled to the Right Honourable the Lords and Commons assembled in High Court of Parliament. Whereunto is annexed, two petitions; the one entituled, The humble petition of divers well-affected citizens of the city of London. The other entituled, The humble petition of divers young-men, citizens, and other apprentices of this honourable city.
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Court of Common Council.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Richard Cotes, printer to the honourable city of London,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
